author: Isabelle Khurshudyan, Missy Ryan, Robyn Dixon, David Stern
title: In defiance of the West, Russia presses military invasion deeper into Ukraine
description: On the first full day of the invasion, President Biden and Western allies unleashed far-reaching sanctions as the Russian invasion of Ukraine appeared to target major cities.
content: Russian troops encountered counterattacks from Ukrainian forces as they staged their invasion along multiple fronts, including from Belarus in the north and Crimea to the south. Several airfields aroâ€¦ [+10836 chars]
